What is this chatbot about?: This chatbot is designed to answer frequently asked questions using AI and NLP techniques.
How does this chatbot work?: It processes user queries using Natural Language Processing and provides relevant responses.
Hi: Hii, I am doing good , How are you , Do u have anything to ask me??
What technologies are used in this chatb: The chatbot is built using Flask, spaCy, and JavaScript.
How do I install and run this chatbot?: You need to install dependencies and run `python app.py` in the backend.
